Key Match Events: Jude Bellingham scored a 95th-minute equaliser to salvage a 2-2 draw for England against Belgium.
Youri Tielemans scored twice for Belgium, capitalizing on defensive mistakes by England.
Ivan Toney scored his first goal for England from the penalty spot.
Jarrod Bowen had a goal ruled out for offside.
Phil Foden narrowly missed a shot.
Lewis Dunk's slip led to Tielemans' second goal.
Pre-Game Insights: England was without several first-choice players due to injuries.
Post-Match Reflections: Jude Bellingham expressed his support for Kobbie Mainoo, highlighting his potential for the future.
Ivan Toney hoped his performance would secure him a spot in the Euro 2024 squad.
Gareth Southgate will now focus on finalizing his squad for Euro 2024.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kobbie Mainoo made an impressive debut and was named player of the match.
The match was played on a heavy, damp pitch.
